data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3550534,"name":"Jon Barrilleaux","username":"jonbarril","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/j/54ee81/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-03-07T17:55:03.424Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eI connected a Limelight 2 directly to my laptop (no robot). It has the latest firmware (Limelight 2 2025.1). I’m also using the latest WPILIB. The limelight web UI works just fine, and I have set up an AprilTag pipeline for MegaTag2 localization. The visualizer works as expected, detecting tags and updating live pose.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eRunning OutlineViewer and Glass, they cannot connect to the limelight in client mode NT4. I have tried resetting the limelight. I have also tried configuring the laptop ethernet IPv4 connection with a static IP address (10.40.87.5, our team number being 4087). In server mode they say no clients connected. I also ran a Python script to read the limelight robot pose in the NT. It returns an empty array (i.e. connects but not in NT). I can ping the limelight camera (at 10.40.87.11).\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eI’ve run out of things to try. Any suggestions?\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":5,"updated_at":"2025-03-07T17:55:03.424Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":6,"reads":58,"readers_count":57,"score":41.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":494654,"topic_slug":"limelight-returning-empty-array-in-nt","display_username":"Jon
